snippet: Hanan Ashrawi, a member of the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee, asked diplomats on Monday to support a renewed bid for observer-state status at the United Nations.
abstract: Hanan Ashrawi, a member of the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee, asks diplomats to support a renewed bid by Palestinian Authority for observer-state status at the United Nations.
lead_paragraph: Hanan Ashrawi, a member of the Palestine Liberation Organization’s executive committee, asked diplomats on Monday to support a renewed bid for observer-state status at the United Nations.

headline.seo: Palestine Liberation Organization Seeks Diplomatic Allies
